entry.title: Indigo
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,721Chapters: 13/13Kudos: 19

Summary: You had grown up in the deep south, middle of nowhere Clyde, Texas. Finally leaving after high school to university a few states away. It wasn't that you were itching to get away. You love your parents, the farm, taking care of the animals and crops. But you were excited to live a little, see the world outside of your town where you knew most the entire population by name.But when your parents both end up sick, both end up passing, you're forced to head home and figure out the future plans for the ranch. Sell it and turn your back on your childhood home? Live there and turn your back on your new life?

entry.title: Dear Daddy Long Legs
entry.summary:
Author: AthenaGC94

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 97,598Chapters: 30/31Kudos: 896

Summary: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm looking for an application for a scholarship.‚Äù‚ÄúYou didn‚Äôt have to hack our systems to apply for a scholarship,‚Äù Tim deadpanned, ‚ÄúI wasn‚Äôt aware you could go to college if you‚Äôre legally dead.‚ÄùHis eye twitched. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm looking for an applicant,‚Äù he amended, ‚ÄúShe already applied.‚ÄùTim finally looked at him. ‚ÄúShe?‚Äù_____Inspired by the novel Daddy Long Legs by Jean Webster. Jason Todd saves you from getting mugged one night and ends up being your mysterious benefactor, funding your college experience. Featuring awkward "zero rizz" Jason Todd and several members of the Bat Family.Jason Todd x Fem!Reader - does not use y/n

entry.title: Josie and the Pussycat
entry.summary:
Author: insert_cooler_username

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 64,784Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 708

Summary: ‚ÄúGot your letter,‚Äù he grumbles, coming closer, looming over your supine form. A mass of muscle and leather and anger. ‚ÄúIs that what you really want?‚Äù‚ÄúWhat?‚Äù you snap out. ‚ÄúA divorce?‚Äù You scoff, shaking your head at him. ‚ÄúNo, what I want is a husband that will actually come home and raise his kid like he promised. But instead I have someone who follows us around on rooftops and lurks in the shadows thinking he‚Äôs some silent protector and not a fucking deadbeat. So yeah, I‚Äôll settle for a divorce. It‚Äôs the next best thing I have.‚Äù-Your husband left you before he could fuck things up. Too bad he still is when he appears in your life several years later, on the advent of your move from Gotham, and asks to meet his daughter. The past is a hard pill to swallow, but Josie deserves a dad. You just have to make sure you don't pussy out of seeing Jason again. Or, at least, that you don't kill each other.

entry.title: So smile!
entry.summary:
Author: crying_outlad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,270Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 106

Summary: You'd always heard the phrase "be careful what you wish for", but you had never paid it any mind. And though growing up you had wished, prayed even, for your family's attention, the yearning had slowed down considerably, enough for you to choose to move out from the hell that had become your life.But just before you can leave the old, creaky manor, your wishes finally come true. And it's only after that you learn to appreciate what you had, awful as it was. But maybe, just maybe, you can escape your suffocating family.------------------Yandere! Batfam x Neglected Male! Reader.My Tumblr is the basically same as my AO3 @ lol.@crying-outlad if you're interested. This is the only post there so far anyway.

entry.title: A Lesson in Weapon Care
entry.summary:
Author: Ava_Mae

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,000Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 49

Summary: You leaned over to Jay, who was sitting next to you on the couch, and asked in an undertone, "Hey, so... Why the hell does Robin have a katana?""'cause Batman couldn't figure out how to take it away without getting himself hurt."Even though he wasn't wearing his helmet, you still couldn't tell if Jay was kidding or not.~Jay shot a quick look in your direction. "It's your birthday?""Tomorrow, technically. My boss gave me the day off, so I figured Alex and I could stay up late tonight, and make a day of it tomorrow.""I didn't know it was your birthday. I would've gotten you something."

Author: Maaaak95

Summary: Jason Todd liked having time to himself, away from the Red Hood persona, away from crime, away from his thoughts.But now his thoughts were consumed, by none other then the barista at the coffee shop he'd began to read at.
